Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic.subscribable

Class Subscribable<Listener>

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.basic.subscribable.Subscribable<Listener>
Type Parameters:
Listener - any listener to associate with the given instance
Direct Known Subclasses:
SubscribableBoolean, SubscribableDouble, SubscribableFloat, SubscribableInt, SubscribableLong, SubscribableObject, SubscribableString
public abstract class Subscribable<Listener>
extends java.lang.Object

This class describes basic functionality for listenable values. Is supports dynamic list of listeners and method to call them.

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addListener​(Listener listener)
    Add listener to the listener's list of the given instance
    abstract void refresh()
    Manually fire events on all the listeners in the container
    void removeListener​(Listener listener)
    Remove listener from the listener's list of the given instance

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      public void addListener​(Listener listener) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Add listener to the listener's list of the given instance

      Parameters:
      listener - listener to add. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if listener to add is null

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener​(Listener listener) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Remove listener from the listener's list of the given instance

      Parameters:
      listener - listener to remove. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if listener to remove is null

    • refresh

      public abstract void refresh()

      Manually fire events on all the listeners in the container
